column1: Starting now! Join the conversation with @PaulBegala at: https://t.co/TaYm4VoZd8 https://t.co/nVFSuRfj8J
Hope you can join me & @PaulBegala for a Sunday afternoon conversation TODAY @ 6PM. Join us at https://t.co/vr9INubkUi. https://t.co/RQ3Vi7tGWe

This Sunday Nov 15th @ 6PM join me and political consultant commentator and former counselor to President Clinton @PaulBegala for a Sunday afternoon discussion. Join us live at: https://t.co/TaYm4VoZd8 https://t.co/D8yw2asigg
Congratulations President-elect @JoeBiden & Vice President-elect @KamalaHarris!! https://t.co/FgbRvn9QZk

Congratulations to the former members of my staff who ran for local office this cycle & won (or are well on the way to winning) — Congrats @deandrebarnes in Portsmouth VA @AnnCan2020 in Richmond VA & @MarniforSD in San Diego CA!   Everyone on Team Scott is very proud of you!
Your support continues to motivate my work on our community’s behalf in the halls of Congress. Thank you!

We have a lot of work to do in the weeks and months ahead to heal our nation defeat this pandemic provide additional economic support to working families small businesses and schools and rebuild our economy so that everyone can succeed.
I want to thank the voters of Virginia’s third congressional district for their strong vote of confidence in me and my record fighting for them in Washington.

Great to catch up with folks at the polls in Smithfield with Councilwoman Valerie Butler and Isle of Wight Democratic Chair Debra Church. A little more than 3 hours until the polls close! #VOTE https://t.co/1HVRUzQ15M

Making my way across Virginia’s 3rd congressional district today. Greeted voters in Chesapeake with @SenLSpruillSr and Del. @CliffHayesJr and in Suffolk with Del. @ClintonHD76 Jenkins. #VOTE Polls close at 7! https://t.co/JSEpE9nkaj

Greeting voters in Norfolk with Norfolk Mayor @KennyAlexander & Del. @jonesjay. Polls close at 7PM. Get out there and vote if you haven’t yet! There’s too much at stake in this election to sit on the sidelines. https://t.co/GevGucymXg https://t.co/uWmrU8AEqg
Greeting voters in Portsmouth with @SenLouiseLucas and Del.  @DonScott757. Polls are open until 7PM. If you haven’t voted yet make a plan —> https://t.co/EkrLUqarhD https://t.co/OAvHST6MEn
TODAY IS ELECTION DAY! Polls are open from 6:00 AM to 7:00 PM. Find your polling location here: https://t.co/88IQAMWkFC.

1 day until Election Day! @MarkWarnerVA @ElaineLuriaVA & I are ready to work with @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris to rebuild our economy & defeat this pandemic. We appreciate your hard work & support during this campaign.   Polls are open 6a-7p tomorrow: https://t.co/Eq1msAXRRx. https://t.co/UhaMbEK5du

We’re less than 2 days out until Election Day. It’s time to get our country back on track and elect @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris and a Democratic Congress! Thanks to @BooWilliamsSP in Hampton for hosting this afternoon’s GOTV rally! https://t.co/6SRO47LmGx

Kicked off canvassing in Hampton this afternoon with @SenatorLocke @jonesjay & @delegateaird. Ready to elect @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris and re-elect @MarkWarnerVA and a Democratic House! https://t.co/eGuvdQaoKI

If you live in Suffolk you can vote early in person until 4:30PM today at 440 Market Street Suffolk VA. More info: https://t.co/VNBSTISbYK

If you live in Portsmouth you can vote early in person until 5PM today at City Hall - 801 Crawford St Portsmouth VA. More info: https://t.co/LrRKTeQ7tb
If you live in Norfolk you can vote early in person until 5PM today at City Hall - 810 Union St Norfolk VA. More info: https://t.co/O9BshM2AWo

If you live in Hampton you can vote early in person until 5PM today at the Voter Registrar's Office - 1919 Commerce Drive Suite 280 Hampton VA. More Info: https://t.co/L62rKNYab1

If you live in Newport News you can vote early in person until 5PM today at City Hall - 2400 Washington Ave Newport News VA & City Center Satellite Office - 700 Town Center Drive Newport News VA. More info: https://t.co/gcrleag1Xr
TODAY is the last day to vote early in Virginia. Make your plan to vote at: https://t.co/Eq1msAXRRx
Join me in Hampton TOMORROW @ 3PM to lit drop and canvass for @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris @MarkWarnerVA and the entire Democratic ticket! Sign up here: https://t.co/5iC9gZnII1

Visited early voting sites in Portsmouth with @SenLouiseLucas and in Norfolk with Mayor @KennyAlexander. You can still vote early in person until tomorrow at 5PM! Make your plan to vote at: https://t.co/Eq1msAXRRx https://t.co/kCzFsgz52d
TODAY @ 5PM — Join @KamalaHarris  for a #DivineNine Town Hall. RSVP here: https://t.co/0Xbz4kFSNs https://t.co/q6beuaku87
Today’s confirmation vote is conclusive evidence that the word of a Republican Senator is not good.
And when GOP Senators say they will protect those with pre-existing conditions remember they also promised not to fill a Supreme Court vacancy during a Presidential election year.

It makes it even more important to elect @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris and a Democratic Congress so we will be in a position to fix the damage the Supreme Court will do to health insurance coverage in the middle of the COVID-19 pandemic.
Through a rushed and hypocritical confirmation process Senate Republicans have moved one step closer to trying to destroy the Affordable Care Act.  https://t.co/KGI9ZotGAN
TODAY @ 2PM -- Join me Lt. Gov. @FairfaxJustin Attorney General @MarkHerringVA & Rep. @Donald_McEachin for a Drive-In Get Out the Vote Rally in Chesapeake! https://t.co/BkroffiHUk
And we'll be back out in Chesapeake tomorrow afternoon at 2pm with @FairfaxJustin & Rep. @Donald_McEachin to get out the vote! https://t.co/5zgnb57uNo

Great turnout at this afternoon's Drive-In GOTV Rally in Chesapeake in support of the 2020 Democratic Ticket! You can still early vote now through Oct 31. https://t.co/p0QlHOIfmn https://t.co/t8KnL9JnhE
UPDATE! Gov. @RalphNortham will be joining us as well to get out the vote! RSVP at https://t.co/38aZHz7d7I https://t.co/KLfpRGpvu4

TODAY @ 1PM - Join me & Team @MarkWarnerVA for an Early Vote Drive-In Rally! RSVP: https://t.co/KfXlStJaQB  We're 10 days out until the most important election in our lifetime. Great to have @DouglasEmhoff back in Hampton Roads today to help me @ElaineLuriaVA & @vademocrats get out the vote! You can still vote early in person now through October 31. Visit https://t.co/Eq1msAXRRx for more info. There’s too much at stake to sit this one out! https://t.co/3sN6zGn22s

TODAY is the deadline for both VA Voter Registration and responding to the 2020 Census!!    ✅ Complete your Census at https://t.co/tvywTq4Q6Z - Take the time to be counted you are worth it!  ✅ Register to Vote at https://t.co/JuDDuBUCVJ  ❌ Don’t wait!! TODAY is the last day!

Joined health care workers in Hampton for a press conference to discuss how many Virginians would lose their health care if the Supreme Court sides with President Trump and strikes down Obamacare. https://t.co/vspeglSx2T

The Virginia voter registration deadline has been extended by a federal court to Thursday October 15th. Don’t sit on the sidelines. Make sure you’re registered to vote. There is too much at stake in this election! https://t.co/j2S9HVPlmi
TODAY is the last day to register to vote in Virginia! You can register online or check your registration status at: https://t.co/j2S9HVxJXI.
@StephsUniverse @davenewworld_2 Thanks for your support!

This year when you go to vote whether that’s early or on Election Day you will face Question 1 on your ballot asking whether you approve of a new state constitutional amendment on redistricting. I’m asking you to vote NO. Read more: https://t.co/pVcRb1aZav

Here in Virginia there's 3 easy and convenient ways to vote for @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris @MarkWarnerVA & me:  1️⃣By mail 2️⃣Early in-person 3️⃣Voting in person on Nov. 3rd.   What’s your plan to vote? #EarlyVoteVA #GoVoteVA https://t.co/dSewgVquBb

Looking forward to joining leaders from across Virginia & the nation tomorrow evening to support @DrCameronWebb! We need more leaders like Cameron in Congress. This is a close race and we have a real opportunity to flip VA-5 Blue! Donate & join us at: https://t.co/rZeADuTq7S
More reckless behavior by the President that jeopardizes the public health. https://t.co/gSlap7wSKQ

Many of you were looking forward to seeing me debate my opponent on Friday at the @chamber757 Virtual Debate.  Unfortunately my opponent has requested that the Debate be postponed b/c of a scheduling issue. Thank you for registering for the Debate and thank you for your support.

We need a national discussion on the climate crisis.   Letter: https://t.co/kLg5KeM6Iw https://t.co/vdtIM6sMLD

.@KamalaHarris is one of our nation’s most brilliant & dedicated public servants. I’ve known her for years & she was “smart on crime” before it was popular. @JoeBiden made a great choice in selecting her to be our next Vice President. Let’s get to work & elect #BidenHarris2020!

Looking forward to joining @MarkWarnerVA TODAY at 3 PM for our virtual town hall. Be sure to RSVP! https://t.co/9dL3ucRZyK

Shameful. Mitch McConnell sent the Senate home for the weekend yesterday. Today millions of unemployed will lose desperately needed aid. House Democrats extended these UI benefits in the Heroes Act 2 months ago! It’s time for the Senate to pass this bill. https://t.co/adc08IdqwI
Goodnight John Lewis we will see you in the morning and we will continue to get into some “good trouble”!! https://t.co/y9EBlw5Adq

After we get COVID under control we must address the child care crisis. All families should be able to afford to send their kids to quality child care. Glad to see @JoeBiden include my bill to cap child care expenses at 7% for hardworking families in his #BuildBackBetter plan!

We are united in electing @JoeBiden president & moving this country in a much-needed progressive direction and bringing transformative change to our criminal justice system. Proud to have been a part of this process. On to November! https://t.co/qP0vHkego5

Honored to officially be declared the 2020 Democratic nominee for the 3rd congressional district of Virginia! While I am grateful my primary focus at this time is helping our community address the Coronavirus. That’s why I’m back in DC working to pass additional economic relief.
